author: Kathleen LeSage
title: New Life Hiking Spa™ in the Green Mountains of Vermont is a Finalist in the 2015 Spafinder Wellness 365 Global Wellness Travel Awards™
text:
Spafinder Wellness 365™ has announced that New Life Hiking Spa has been selected as a finalist for the 2015 Global Wellness Travel Awards. The final candidates for the second annual awards were named across 20 categories by a panel of 33 wellness travel editors and experts, who nominated 504 properties for consideration before narrowing the field to finalists in 53 countries and regions. New Life Hiking Spa was selected as a finalist for the Best for Affordability & Budget category.
Consumer voting for winners began on August 13, and ends September 30. View the complete list of finalists at http://www.wellnesstravelawards.com .
“We are grateful to our global panel of travel editors and experts who worked to identify the best in wellness travel from all corners of the world,” said Spafinder Wellness, Inc.® Chief Brand Officer, Mia Kyricos. “It is a tribute to the entire team at New Life Hiking Spa to have been selected as a finalist for this prestigious award—and it reflects their commitment to provide the best possible experiences for people looking to feel good and live well while traveling.”
Wellness Travel Award winners will be announced in a press release on November 4 from the World Travel Market in London.
About New Life Hiking Spa™
New Life Hiking Spa has been operating in the Green Mountains of Vermont since1978 and is open each year from mid-May through the end of September, when hiking is at its peak in the Green Mountains. New Life is an award-winning wellness spa retreat and has been selected by Rand McNally as “One of the Three Best Summer Road Trips” for 2015 and selected as “One of the Top Ten Wellness Retreats in the World” by The Active Times. New Life Hiking Spa has been named “One of Four Great Weight Loss Spas " by Health Magazine, “A Hiker’s Paradise” by SELF Magazine and “One of Five Budget Friendly Luxury Health Spas” by AARP Magazine.
The all-inclusive affordable prices range from $225-$265 per night at this destination spa. Nightly rates include a private room, three freshly prepared meals a day, guided hikes, one massage for each three night stay, all cooking demos, lectures and fitness classes.
More information can be found online at http://www.newlifehikingspa.com or by calling 802-353-2954.
About Spafinder Wellness, Inc.®
Spafinder Wellness, Inc.® is the world’s largest media and marketing company for the spa and wellness industry and the leading consumer resource for feeling good and living well all year round. With nearly 30 years of experience as a spa and wellness authority, millions of people find inspiration to keep well every day via the Spafinder Wellness 365™ brand, also known for its widely distributed gift cards—available at 40,000-plus retailers worldwide—and its global network of 26,000-plus spas, salons, fitness, yoga and Pilates studios and travel destinations. The company’s Workplace Wellness 365™ division offers incentive products and partnerships that help to foster wellness in the workplace. Learn more at spafinder.com, spafinder.co.uk and spafinder.ca.
